pages.title: Kamen Rider Amazon Sigma
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Amazons Season 1 (2016, web series)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:amazons/devices/amazons_driver#amazons_driver_sigma)Amazons Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch VII$(li)Speed III$(li)Resistance II$(li)Jump Boost III$(li)Strength X (with empty hand)
